mapper.sql: select * from (select id as auditId, ixData, modData, auditType, state as auditState, resultDesc from umpay.T_HFAUDIT where id in (select max(id) as auditId from umpay.T_HFAUDIT where tableName = 'UMPAY.T_COUPON_INF' group by ixData)) a full join umpay.T_COUPON_INF b on a.ixData = b.couponId
